explains: v. （使）挨饿，饿死；使极其缺乏，需要

sentences.en: The animals were left to starve to death.
sentences.cn: 那些动物只能等着饿死。

sentences.en: The army intends to take the city or simply starve it into submission.
sentences.cn: 这个军队打算占领这座城市或干脆使其挨饿到投降。

sentences.en: If my back go idle, I starve.
sentences.cn: 如果我的背闲着，那我就要挨饿了。
